comment: I know conservatives are just "owning the insult" but what is "deplorable" about being a stable and good human being? What's so "radical" about it? I bet most of you aren't even racist or want the coming civil war... I feel bad for you good people caught in the middle of the shitstorm. Your generosity has been taken advantage of for far too long.
